scripts.start: docker build --load -t senny . && docker rmi $(docker images -f 'dangling=true' -q) && docker run --name senny --env-file .env -it senny
scripts.deploy: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64/v8 --push -t elliefloof/senny . && ssh ellie@45.47.73.5 '~/projects/senny/deploy.sh'
scripts.stop: docker stop senny && docker rm senny
